title: Vegan Surf Camp
description: From 2016 July 2 until August 27 Vegan Surf Camp's international staff welcomes you to Moliets-Plage in the southwest coast of France. Learn to surf, do yoga, and enjoy organic vegan meals--all in an eco-friendly, relaxed, party atmosphere.
streetAddress: Camping les Cigales, Avenue de L'oc√©an
